alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens, south central Spartanburg and southwestern Union Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Laurens, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Joanna, Rose Hill State Park, Gray Court, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Sedalia, Enoree and Ora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
